title: Christmas Wish #8: Kyle Schultz
description: Heidi's brother Kyle was diagnosed with with ALS at the age of 23.  He has always been a very active person, loved to ski and longboard, and now he's unable to do any of that.  We want to make Kyle's Christmas a little brighter this year with a Christmas WIsh.
